title: Biotech Venture Capital Investment in China Climbs
sub_head: Innovation grows in a Chinese drug industry that has been better known for generics
body:
Venture-capital investment in Chinese biotechnology startups is rising as the nationâ€™s drug industry turns toward more innovative medications.
Chinese biotechs raised $16.6 billion through 568 venture financings in 2021, up from $11.2 billion in 418 deals in 2020, according to research firm PitchBook Data Inc.
Chinese drug startups secured...
